channel.title: Ash Scape is Hiring
channel.description:
[b]The Reason[/b] I have seen most of the servers made, Aren't really that good. I would like to make a server, that is very simliar to old-school runescape (before they got rid of the wildy, added the trade-bs,etc) I do understand I am a huge noob at all this server stuff, but I want to learn, and i am very willing to learn, I just need someone that has the time and patients to teach me. (enough of that) I want this server to be ,maybe no the best, but be up with the best of all the servers, I want AshScape to be a very good designed server, but ofcourse, i just have the Idea of a server,Many of you have the knowledge to make this server come to life. I will help out best I can, but I need help. As a reward for helping make this server, This team we put together will have admin rights to the server, you'll get your share of credits for being apart of making this server, and you will also have the special privilige to keep a copy of the server on your computer (ofcourse I would like it to not be leaked, but its up to you).
[b]About me[/b] I'm a little whinny 16 year old kid, classified as "emo" *sigh* I barely have a life, I spend most of my time on my computer, but i do have a job (at pizza hut!=P) and I am still in school. I can be annoying as hell, but I do get serious everyone once and awhile. I have wanted to make a server for a long time, and I have almost no experience in Java and all that crap. I am almost completely retarded in coding and stuff, Ofcourse i would like to learn (not that i haven't been trying..Its just alittle hard to understand for me)
[b]Who we are looking for[/b]
First of all, We need more..well..Everything =O
I need someone else to help me lead this crazy ride,So if anyone wants, they can be the co-leader of the developement team. But I have to have people who are willing to learn (and maybe teach me) Java, C++, and anything else you think we will need.
[b]Requirements for joining[/b]
- Knowing atleast a few things of programming
- willing to learn.
- ability to listen
- Must pass ONE of the following tests... - IQ test
=P
[b]Contact me[/b]
I would prefer being contacted on Yahoo(or MSN if you must) but if you want I do IRC. PM me on these fourms. Anything you wanna do,
[b]The Team[/b]
[b]Developers[/b] (Full) - Ashi (meowxrawr) - Frank (-MurdeR-) - Cameron (Money Bags) - Liam (Mopar Helper)
[b]Coders[/b] (Full) - Josh (TranScape) - Aaron (~Aaron~) - Pat (akanaz) - Chris (codermoder)
[b]Mods[/b]
- Ben (Baize) - Michael Ibarra (Ganaray) -
[b]Server Hoster[/b]
-Alex (ch1llsc4p3) [7hour host] - Alex (zeb) - -
[b]And finally[/b]
- Yahoo/MSN/: Meowxrawr@yahoo.com Stoner_Boner_@hotmail.com (when you add me, please tell me who you are) - Fourms: [b]CANNOT ADVERTISE SITES! -Evil_[/b] (sorry, PM me for details)
[code] Name: Age: position: Experience(if any): If no to above, are you willing to learn?: why should I hire you: Preferred IM: [/code]
[b]Please don't flame me for being a noob (if i am being one)[/b]

I may join after some time, if I see this actually go anywhere.

edit I can’t be sure a 10rep junior will make a difference. No offense.

edit All the applyies are 10 rep juniors. No offense.

and post count and rep means what…??
Nothing… and how can you judge people by that,your clearly an idiot, no offense.
im still a junior member because i havent been on these forums for months.
[/quote]

The only person to say post count and rep means nothing have little, or lack there of.[/quote]
So in theory…if evil_ or ikiliki made a new account with 0 posts and 10 reps it means they know nothing? hell no.

item.title: Ash Scape is Hiring
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

Name: Liam
Age: 15
position: Developer, Moderator (i will want to become a moderator if i get to like the server and if it is going well, i will be very active when it comes to descent servers.
Experience(if any): Been here a year, have a good idea on experienced coding and small experience when it comes to Client coding.
If no to above, are you willing to learn?: I dont think i will learn much here, but im hoping to create some original ideas.
why should I hire you: Because ive been in the community for a long time and have a good idea on what you require.
Preferred IM: MSN, liamownsyou_123@hotmail.com, anyone else adds me i will just delete you.

[quote=“Syrillia, post:8, topic:175332”]I may join after some time, if I see this actually go anywhere.

edit I can’t be sure a 10rep junior will make a difference. No offense.

edit All the applyies are 10 rep juniors. No offense.[/quote]
why does this effect there ability to code, program and host?
no offence but i reccomend you shutup.

REP and POST COUNT may not represent what they're supposed to, but people can get a good idea of what your like from it. A junior member with 10 rep, can simply means that you haven't been at Moparscape very long, therefore, it's hard to determine whether you've into RSPS for very long. That's all I meant. Plus, this thread doesn't have an accomplishments list, so I can't tell if you're doing anything apart from playing the smart team leader.
Ok, you look when i joined compared to you, and look at my post count compared to you, and say that again fool.

Read full topic

btw, i added you on msn.
